Uses of Package
org.opengrok.indexer.index

  • Packages that use org.opengrok.indexer.index 
    Package Description
    org.opengrok.indexer.analysis  
    org.opengrok.indexer.configuration  
    org.opengrok.indexer.index  
    org.opengrok.indexer.search  
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.analysis 
    Class Description
    NumLinesLOCAggregator
    Represents an accumulator of net-deltas of #Lines and LOC for directories.
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.configuration 
    Class Description
    IndexerParallelizer
    Represents a container for executors that enable parallelism for indexing across projects and repositories and also within any IndexDatabase instance -- with global limits for all execution.
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.index 
    Class Description
    IndexAnalysisSettings
    Represents a serializable gathering of some top-level metadata concerning the operation of IndexDatabase -- and persisted therein too -- which are re-compared upon each indexing run since changes to them might require re-indexing particular files or in certain cases all files.
    IndexAnalysisSettings3
    Represents a serializable gathering of some top-level metadata concerning the operation of IndexDatabase -- and persisted therein too -- which are re-compared upon each indexing run since changes to them might require re-indexing particular files or in certain cases all files.
    IndexChangedListener
    The changes in an index database may be monitored through this interface.
    IndexCheck.IndexCheckMode
    Index check modes.
    IndexCheck.IndexDocumentException
    Exception thrown when index contains duplicate live documents.
    IndexCheck.IndexVersionException
    Exception thrown when index version does not match Lucene version.
    IndexedSymlink
    Represents the associated data of a symlink indexed by IndexDatabase.
    Indexer
    Creates and updates an inverted source index as well as generates Xref, file stats etc., if specified in the options.
    IndexerException  
    IndexWriterConfigFactory  
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.index used by org.opengrok.indexer.search 
    Class Description
    IndexAnalysisSettings3
    Represents a serializable gathering of some top-level metadata concerning the operation of IndexDatabase -- and persisted therein too -- which are re-compared upon each indexing run since changes to them might require re-indexing particular files or in certain cases all files.
    IndexedSymlink
    Represents the associated data of a symlink indexed by IndexDatabase.
